#summary This page will guide you through setting up fife and fife-tutorials.

= Introduction =
The instructions below will guide you through downloading and setting up the fife
engine as well as the fife-tutorials.

----
= Windows Install =
  # Checkout the [http://fife.svn.cvsdude.com/engine/branches/active/engine_maploader fife source code] either using the subversion command line or through a GUI such as tortoiseSVN
  # Download the latest [http://code.google.com/p/fife-tutorials/downloads/list precompiled dependencies] and unzip it in the `<path-to-fife`>/build/win32 directory
  # Checkout the [https://fife-tutorials.googlecode.com/svn/trunk fife-tutorials] in the `<path-to-fife`>/clients directory
=== Using Visual Studio ===
  # Execute the script `<path-to-fife`>/build/win32/update_project_files.bat
  # Navigate to `<path-to-fife`>/build/win32/build_environments/visual_studio`_`# where # is the version of visual studio you are using
  # Open the solution fife_engine.sln
  # Go to the build configurations menu within visual studio and select either the "Debug_static" or "Release_static" configuration
  # Build the solution
